title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 5, pt. 465 - Confidentiality Of Information Collected By The Child Care Review Service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 5, pt. 465 - Confidentiality Of Information Collected By The Child Care Review Service

State Regulations
§ 465.1 - Confidentiality and access of information
§ 465.2 - Notification to the child or representative
§ 465.3 - Failure to comply with confidentiality and access provisions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 5, pt. 465

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20, 34, 153-k, 409-f [1], 427[1], 442, 444, 446; L. 1997, ch. 436

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
